actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing monetary allowances for toll-free telephone service for telephone calls to the district offices of Members of the House.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to reimburse each Member, from the contingent fund of the House, in an amount sufficient for each quarter of each calendar year, solely for the payment of basic monthly charges for toll-free telephone service for telephone calls from the congressional district in the State from which such Member is elected to any office of such Member in the congressional district which he represents.

titles.title: Resolution providing monetary allowances for toll-free telephone service for telephone calls to the district offices of Members of the House.
